## Result


```{r }
library(ggplot2)
file_comparision_models = 'C:\\IPSTERS\\sraster\\vignettes\\F1_Comparison.csv'

#reading file
comparision_models  = read.csv(file_comparision_models, sep = ";",header = T, dec = ',')
#ggplot
p1 <- ggplot(data = comparision_models , aes(x=Class, y=F1, fill = Base )) + geom_boxplot()
print(p1)
```




```{r }
library(ggplot2)
```
